PROFESSIONAL PROFILE
Accomplished & versatile professional with over 20 years of experience in the Oil & Gas Industry,
including front line Sales, Technical sales, Engineering design and hands-on experience in operation of refining and petrochemical process units.
Currently working as an Account manager responsible for sales of complete UOP portfolio for Kuwait Oman and Bahrain.

WORK EXPERIENCE IN DETAILS
Account Manager (Kuwait and Bahrain)
• Responsible for driving sales and business development for complete UOP portfolio which
includes new project sales and aftermarket business.
• Promote and position UOP gas processing, refining and petrochemical business .
• Develop and grow UOP’s aftermarket installed base. Aftermarket includes revamps of
existing UOP process technology, retrofits and upgrade of UOP equipment, refills of
catalyst and adsorbent and sell Honeywell IIOT offering (CPS).
Sales Account Manager (Catalyst and Adsorbent)
• Responsible for driving the growth of Catalyst and Adsorbent by creating/identifying
opportunities and ensure momentum in sales cycle for achieving the target. Meet the agreed
annual sales revenue, direct margin, volumes, price and product mix for catalyst and
adsorbent portfolio.
• Ensure to keep opportunity pipeline full with strategic targets and use internal Company
tools to forecast revenue potential and enhance internal communication to strategize key
accounts and maximize winning probability.
• Manage customer relationship to maximise revenue potential in the refining and
petrochemical sector.
Sales Achievements
• Expanded UOP’s catalyst foot print in KSA, UAE, Oman, Bahrain, Kuwait by retaining
catalyst reload of incumbent units and multiple take away of competitor units for various
technology like CCR Platforming, Hydrocracking, Hydrotreating, Aromatics , Adsorbents
etc.
• Received PMT President Club Award in 2019 for driving and exceeding revenue target
of 73M USD by winning multiple Hydrocracking and Hydrotreating and Platforming
catalyst reloads.
• Received PMT President Club Award in 2016 for winning the Bapco Hydrocracker
reload which was a key take away project and reloading of ADNOC hydrocracker through
persuasive selling and nose methodology.
• Received Bravo and Chairman’s team award in 2018 for take away of Saudi Aramco
Ras Tanura Hydrocracker.
• Received 2014 commercial excellence award for supporting multiple hydrocracking reload
wins in Europe.
• Received 2014 HGR team award for winning multiple hydrocracking unit at Tupras for a
total revenue of 20M.
Technical Sales Specialist (Hydrocracking)
• Develop catalyst performance estimates to support sales in reload events of hydrocracking
catalysts. Sound knowledge of UOP catalysts & process variables and overall sound
knowledge of UOP hydrocracking technology.
• Conduct technical presentations on UOP’s hydrocracking catalyst portfolio and provide
technical proposals of the proposed catalyst system, supporting sales.
• Liaise with UOP R&D to conduct customer demo pilot plant runs in support of a sales
reload events. Work up and analyze unit operating-, and pilot plant data to produce
catalyst performance estimates.
• Providing Technical Sales assisting UOP’s salesforce to achieve hydrocracking catalysts
sales targets.
• Assist UOP Technical Service in analyzing and troubleshooting catalyst performance
issues.
• Develop technical strategies to beat competition in take away catalyst reload projects.
• Work with customers in providing the right catalyst solution for optimum and best
performance of the units. Ac
